snippet: In translating Buber’s writings, Mr. Friedman introduced the Austrian-born philosopher and his influential work to an English-reading public.
abstract: Maurice S Friedman, biographer and translator who introduced Martin Buber to the English-reading public, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: In translating Buber’s writings, Mr. Friedman introduced the Austrian-born philosopher and his influential work to an English-reading public.

headline.seo: Maurice S. Friedman, Biographer of Martin Buber, Dies at 90
headline.main: Maurice S. Friedman, Martin Buber’s Biographer, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Maurice S. Friedman, 90, Martin Buber’s Biographer
